post.text: For forty years, every presidential candidate has released their tax returnsâ€”except for Trump. What's he hiding?

comment.author: Daryn
comment.text: EXACTLY.....WHAT is he hiding??? I wonder WHY he is hiding his IRS information??? Hmmm.....I wouldn't trust him to watch a scorpion, for fear the scorpion would die. Trump, you and your FAKE Barbie and Ken doll family should move to Russia, since you love it SO much.

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: American would be lucky to have Russia as an ally

replies.text: pretty sure they technically are allies? forgive me if im wrong, im not really that into international relations
